dl.dd:
If this attribute is set to true, the template.XULElem("tabs") row will have a "new tab" button and "close" button on the ends. This feature is used by the template.XULElem("tabbrowser") to provide the facilities for adding and closing tabs. You can set an image to the "new tab" and "close" buttons by applying them to the template.XULStyle("tabs-newbutton") and template.XULStyle("tabs-closebutton") classes respectively.
